mapper.sql: ID, CULPRIT_ID, NEW_CRIME, REGISTER_UNIT, REGISTER_TIME, DIC_GRASP_TYPE_KEY, GRASP_TIME, JUDGMENT_TIME, JUDGMENT_COURT, JUDGMENT_PATH, JUDGMENT_PATH_NAME, UNGUILTY_REASON, UNGUILTY_PATH, UNGUILTY_PATH_NAME, REPORT_TIME, REPORT_PERSON, REPORT_UNIT, DIC_IS_TOCRIME_KEY, CRIME_DETAILS, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG,PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, COERCIVE_MEASURE_KEY,COERCIVE_MEASURE_DATE, (select g.name from SYS_GROUP g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.GROUP_ID where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) groupName, (select c.name from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) culpritName
mapper.insert: insert into SF_OMITTED_CRIME (ID, CULPRIT_ID, NEW_CRIME, REGISTER_UNIT, REGISTER_TIME, DIC_GRASP_TYPE_KEY, GRASP_TIME, JUDGMENT_TIME, JUDGMENT_COURT, JUDGMENT_PATH, JUDGMENT_PATH_NAME, UNGUILTY_REASON, UNGUILTY_PATH, UNGUILTY_PATH_NAME, REPORT_TIME, REPORT_PERSON, REPORT_UNIT, DIC_IS_TOCRIME_KEY, CRIME_DETAILS, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG,PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID,COERCIVE_MEASURE_KEY,COERCIVE_MEASURE_DATE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newCrime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dicGraspTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graspTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{judgmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{judgmentCourt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{judgmentPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{judgmentPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unguiltyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unguiltyPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unguiltyPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reportPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicIsTocrimeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crimeDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coerciveMeasureKey,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{coerciveMeasureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update SF_OMITTED_CRIME
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_CRIME = #{newCrime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_UNIT = #{registerUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DIC_GRASP_TYPE_KEY = #{dicGraspTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRASP_TIME = #{graspTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JUDGMENT_TIME = #{judgmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JUDGMENT_COURT = #{judgmentCourt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JUDGMENT_PATH = #{judgmentPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JUDGMENT_PATH_NAME = #{judgmentPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNGUILTY_REASON = #{unguiltyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNGUILTY_PATH = #{unguiltyPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNGUILTY_PATH_NAME = #{unguiltyPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_TIME = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REPORT_PERSON = #{reportPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_UNIT = #{reportUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_IS_TOCRIME_KEY = #{dicIsTocrimeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRIME_DETAILS = #{crimeDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID=#{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COERCIVE_MEASURE_KEY=#{coerciveMeasureKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COERCIVE_MEASURE_DATE=#{coerciveMeasureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_OMITTED_CRIME set CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_CRIME = #{newCrime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_UNIT = #{registerUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DIC_GRASP_TYPE_KEY = #{dicGraspTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRASP_TIME = #{graspTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JUDGMENT_TIME = #{judgmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JUDGMENT_COURT = #{judgmentCourt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JUDGMENT_PATH = #{judgmentPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JUDGMENT_PATH_NAME = #{judgmentPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNGUILTY_REASON = #{unguiltyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNGUILTY_PATH = #{unguiltyPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNGUILTY_PATH_NAME = #{unguiltyPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_TIME = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REPORT_PERSON = #{reportPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_UNIT = #{reportUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_IS_TOCRIME_KEY = #{dicIsTocrimeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRIME_DETAILS = #{crimeDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID=#{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COERCIVE_MEASURE_KEY=#{coerciveMeasureKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COERCIVE_MEASURE_DATE=#{coerciveMeasureDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: AND exists (select * from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=t.CULPRIT_ID and c.name like '%'||#{culpritName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
AND exists (select * from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=t.CULPRIT_ID and c.GROUP_ID=#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.group_id where c.id=CULPRIT_ID)
